item.title: About Me
item.description:
Greetings ðŸ‘‹, my name is Anvesh Dange! I am an AI enthusiast (primarily deep generative modeling, multimodal models, Transformer, Neural Networks), tinker with Linux, and explore anything else I fancy. I happen to be a Junior Student doing Bachelors in Artificial Intelligence.

Outside of the computer-sphere, I enjoy productively procrastinating by watching Anime & yt videos. I also have an interest in (slowly) learning games like chess.
